item.title: US-491 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-491 south just past the CO-141 junction. Distance to Dove Creek and Cortez.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching CO-141
item.description: US-491 South approaching CO-141 north to Egnar and Naturita. Continue south on US-491 for Dove Creek.

item.title: US-491 South - Dolores County
item.description: Dolores County on US-491 south. The Colorado welcome sign can be seen in the background. Taken at the Utah-Colorado state line.
